post.description: For this transaction you need the role 'BDUSER'

delete.description: Only the author or user with 'ADMIN' role can delete a comment

patch.description: Only the author or user with 'ADMIN' role can update a comment

patch.summary: Add or remove a upvote to measure comment relevance

get.summary: Get full article details based on id

patch.description: Only the author or user with 'ADMIN' role can update an article

patch.summary: Add or remove a upvote to measure article relevance
patch.description:
If you already upVoted the article, your upVote will be delete,
otherwise it will be created
Only the author or user with 'ADMIN' role can publish an article
Only the author or user with 'ADMIN' role can archive an article

get.summary: Get comment details with number of upVotes
Get comment based on author (logged user)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: choose between: 'view' (most viewed), 'latest' and 'relevance' (based on upVotes)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: filter the articles by specific title

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: filter the articles by specific tags

get.description: Return the articles based on the logged user, by the JWT token

post.description:
Quadrants are represented by enums, use this notation:
Only one of each: FIRST_QUADRANT, SECOND_QUADRANT, THIRD_QUADRANT, FOURTH_QUADRANT

Only users with 'ADMIN' role can create quadrant

Create multiple quadrants all at once, passing a list of objects
Only users with 'ADMIN' role can create quadrants

get.summary: Get active items for radar view

post.description:
Rings and Expectation are represented by enums, use this notation:
rings: HOLD, OBSERVE, TRIAL, ADOPT
expectation: UNKNOWN("-"), ZERO_TWO("0 - 2"), TWO_FIVE("2 - 5"), FIVE_TEN("5 - 10")
Only user with 'BDUSER' or 'ADMIN' role can create item

post.summary: Create multiple items all at once
post.description:
Create multiple items all at once, passing a list of objects
Only user with 'BDUSER' or 'ADMIN' role can create items

patch.description: Only users with 'ADMIN' role can update quadrant
Only users with 'BDUSER' or 'ADMIN' role can update item
Only users with 'ADMIN' role can publish item
Only item author or user with 'ADMIN' role can archive item

get.summary: Get all items from a specific quadrant

get.description: In case user has ADMIN role, it will return all items, otherwise will return only the items related to them

get.summary: Get all items for radar view
